accessibility_support_other: We always ask if anyone has specific needs and always aim to modify or adjust to suit people's needs.
description: Are you a word wrangler? Discover how language, structure, and micro-content work together to create accessible content. This course is great for anyone who creates, publishes, or manages digital content.
platforms: Our courses are normally conducted via Zoom but we are flexible to the needs of attendees.
prerequisites: No prior knowledge of accessibility is required.
title: Creating accessible content
topics: Content that is easy to read and understand
Creating accessible links, headings, tables, and page titles
Writing accessible form labels, instructions, and notifications.
